name: Power System Architect Agent
tagline: AI-assisted design of integrated power systems for complex applications
overview: The Power System Architect Agent envisions AI that assists engineers in designing integrated power systems for complex applications—data centers, marine vessels, mining operations, and distributed generation. It would optimize across engines, generators, storage, and controls to meet demanding performance requirements.
whatItDoes: Models system performance across operating scenarios
prompts: Design a power system for a 20MW data center with 99.999% uptime requirement
What's the optimal generator configuration for this offshore platform?
How should we integrate battery storage into this mining operation?
Compare hybrid vs pure diesel architecture for this marine application
Optimize this distributed generation system for fuel efficiency
guardrails: All designs require professional engineering review and stamp
Safety-critical systems require full manual design review
AI suggestions inform, not replace, engineering judgment
Customer commitments made only by authorized personnel
whatsNext: Vision phase—exploring technical feasibility with power systems engineering. Defining scope and initial use cases.
